titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-124, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 48.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 249.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 202 (Roll no. 211).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 202 (Roll no. 212).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/22/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on May 21, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of H.R. 2 (Jobs and Growth Reconciliation Tax Act of 2003).
